title: Best in Food
overview: All across the country, thousands of specialty chefs compete in elite food events to prove that their dish rises above the rest and deserves the title of undisputed champ. On Best in Food, viewers get a front row seat to some of the most amazing food competitions, and get to cheer on the culinary talent creating these unique and delicious dishes. From the world's best Pizza, to succulent seafood, to mouth-watering burgers and everything in between, these fast and fun episodes show off the greatest food competitions in the world!
